statements: SELECT * FROM network_traffic_log;
SELECT id, source_ip, destination_ip FROM network_traffic_log;
SELECT destination_ip, source_ip, data_size, timestamp FROM network_traffic_log ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_log WHERE protocol = 'HTTP' AND port = 80;
SELECT id, source_ip, protocol, data_size FROM network_traffic_log WHERE data_size > 1000 ORDER BY data_size DESC;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_log WHERE protocol='TCP' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, port FROM network_traffic_log WHERE data_size > 1000 ORDER BY destination_ip ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_logs, AVG(data_size) AS avg_data_size FROM network_traffic_log WHERE timestamp >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT protocol FROM network_traffic_log ORDER BY protocol;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_log WHERE source_ip LIKE '192.%' AND destination_ip NOT LIKE '10.%';
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_logs;
SELECT log_id, source_ip, timestamp FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE source_ip = '192.168.0.1';
SELECT destination_ip, traffic_data FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT activity_id, activity_description, timestamp FROM suspicious_activities ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT log_id, destination_ip FROM network_traffic_logs ORDER BY log_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE source_ip='192.168.1.1'
SELECT log_id, source_ip, timestamp FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE destination_ip='10.0.0.1' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT log_id, destination_ip, traffic_data FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT nt.log_id, sa.activity_description, sa.timestamp FROM network_traffic_logs nt INNER JOIN suspicious_activities sa ON nt.log_id = sa.log_id
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM network_traffic_logs
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE traffic_type = 'HTTP' LIMIT 10;
SELECT log_id, timestamp FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE source_ip = '10.0.0.1';
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE source_ip LIKE '192.168.%';
SELECT destination_ip, COUNT(*) AS num_logs FROM network_traffic_logs GROUP BY destination_ip ORDER BY num_logs DESC;
SELECT log_id, source_ip, destination_ip, traffic_type, timestamp FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE source_ip = '192.168.1.1';
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, timestamp FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT destination_ip, COUNT(*) AS total_traffic_count FROM network_traffic_logs GROUP BY destination_ip ORDER BY total_traffic_count DESC;
SELECT AVG(timestamp), MAX(timestamp), MIN(timestamp) FROM network_traffic_logs;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE traffic_type = 'HTTP' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, timestamp, source_ip, destination_ip, packet_size FROM network_traffic_logs;
SELECT activity_id, timestamp, activity_description FROM suspicious_activities;
SELECT user_id, timestamp, login_status FROM login_attempts;
SELECT device_id, device_name, ip_address, last_seen FROM network_devices;
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, packet_size, timestamp, user_id FROM network_traffic_logs;
SELECT user_id, timestamp, source_ip, packet_size FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT activity_id, timestamp, activity_description FROM suspicious_activities WHERE activity_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT user_id, timestamp, login_status FROM login_attempts WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND login_status = 'failed';
SELECT device_id, device_name, ip_address, last_seen FROM network_devices WHERE last_seen < '2022-06-30' ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, packet_size FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE packet_size > 1000 ORDER BY packet_size DESC, timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_log LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, source_ip, destination_ip FROM network_devices WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT destination_ip, timestamp FROM suspicious_traffic_log ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, device_name, ip_address FROM network_devices WHERE type = 'server' AND status = 'active';
SELECT MAX(data_size) AS max_data_size FROM network_traffic_log;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_log ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, source_ip, destination_ip, data_size FROM network_traffic_log WHERE status = 'success'
SELECT id, source_ip, destination_ip, timestamp FROM network_traffic_log WHERE data_size > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT * FROM network_anomalies WHERE severity = 'high' AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59'
SELECT id, device_name, ip_address FROM network_devices WHERE status = 'active'
